text: @SenSchumer Coronavirus deaths are an all time low. We have the lowest death toll in the world.The economy is booming and Trump added 400,000 new jobs for Black people in June alone.What have you ever done for Black people?What have you ever done for anybody in the 40 years you’re in office?
